Name: Mexican Vineyard
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE 8 grapes in base of shaker. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Review: Perhaps best summarised as being an 'Apple and Grape Margarita', the flavours combine harmoniously in this well-balanced cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe created circa 2005 by Stephen Watts at a cocktail bar somewhere in deepest Nottingham, England.
